name: Poker With Bob
summary: "Poker With Bob" is a draw poker game like no other! The player faces off against Bob, a real time, fully animated 3d character loaded up with several minutes of lip synced animation. He rants and raves when he loses and taunts the player mercilessly when he wins.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Dustin Adair's "Poker With Bob"  -  Awesome game for iPhone/iPad/iPod!! Voice by Ed Mace
